original_text:
Surely it is you who love the people;
    all the holy ones are in your hand.
At your feet they all bow down,
    and from you receive instruction,
korean_text: 여호와께서 백성을 사랑하시나니 모든 성도가 그의 수중에 있으며 주의 발 아래에 앉아서 주의 말씀을 받는도다

sentences.original_text: Surely it is you who love the people
all the holy ones are in your hand
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 거룩한 자들이 당신의 손에 있습니다

sentences.original_text: At your feet they all bow down
